[Plain Bob,7]

#N.B. There seems to exist some confusion as to the naming of the calls made at the 1st and 5th leads of a 7th-fixed course. In all the following compositions the 1st lead (7 = 56 up, i.e. -235746 from plain course) is labelled Wrong and the 5th lead (7 = 56 up, i.e. -235746 from plain course) is labelled Middle.

56
	234567	
-	235746	1
-	237654	1
-	236475	1
-	234567	1
